name: Bombyman
description:
Bombyman is the first VR game in which the player takes on the role of the title hero.

The game takes place in a magical world in which the task is to visit all worlds and pass all levels in each of them. Each level is a labyrinth in which
you have to find the exit hidden somewhere in one of the destructible walls.

Beware! At each level you will meet different types of creatures that will want to prevent you from doing so. Use your explosive bombs to kill opponents as well as to destroy walls, where amazing power-ups are hidden, making it easier to move to the next stages of the game faster!

"Bomb-run-boom-repeat"
